00044 #ifndef PLANEDIREPSILON
00045 #define PLANEDIREPSILON 0.0000001f
00046 #endif

00048 #ifndef PARALELENORMALS
00049 #define PARALELENORMALS 0.000001f

00052 #define TRIANGLE_NORMAL(v1,v2,v3,n)\
00053 {\
00054         vec3f _dif1,_dif2;\
00055     VEC_DIFF(_dif1,v2,v1);\
00056     VEC_DIFF(_dif2,v3,v1);\
00057     VEC_CROSS(n,_dif1,_dif2);\
00058     VEC_NORMALIZE(n);\
00059 }\
00060 
00061 #define TRIANGLE_NORMAL_FAST(v1,v2,v3,n){\
00062     vec3f _dif1,_dif2; \
00063     VEC_DIFF(_dif1,v2,v1); \
00064     VEC_DIFF(_dif2,v3,v1); \
00065     VEC_CROSS(n,_dif1,_dif2); \
00066 }\
00067 
00069 #define TRIANGLE_PLANE(v1,v2,v3,plane) {\
00070     TRIANGLE_NORMAL(v1,v2,v3,plane);\
00071     plane[3] = VEC_DOT(v1,plane);\
00072 }\
00073 
00075 #define TRIANGLE_PLANE_FAST(v1,v2,v3,plane) {\
00076     TRIANGLE_NORMAL_FAST(v1,v2,v3,plane);\
00077     plane[3] = VEC_DOT(v1,plane);\
00078 }\
00079 
00081 #define EDGE_PLANE(e1,e2,n,plane) {\
00082     vec3f _dif; \
00083     VEC_DIFF(_dif,e2,e1); \
00084     VEC_CROSS(plane,_dif,n); \
00085     VEC_NORMALIZE(plane); \
00086     plane[3] = VEC_DOT(e1,plane);\
00087 }\
00088 
00089 #define DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(plane,point) (VEC_DOT(plane,point) - plane[3])
00090 
00091 #define PROJECT_POINT_PLANE(point,plane,projected) {\
00092         GREAL _dis;\
00093         _dis = DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(plane,point);\
00094         VEC_SCALE(projected,-_dis,plane);\
00095         VEC_SUM(projected,projected,point);     \
00096 }\

00099 template<typename CLASS_POINT,typename CLASS_PLANE>
00100 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool POINT_IN_HULL(
00101         const CLASS_POINT& point,const CLASS_PLANE * planes,GUINT plane_count)
00102 {
00103         GREAL _dis;
00104         for (GUINT _i = 0;_i< plane_count;++_i)
00105         {
00106                 _dis = DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(planes[_i],point);
00107             if(_dis>0.0f) return false;
00108         }
00109         return true;
00110 }

00112 template<typename CLASS_POINT,typename CLASS_PLANE>
00113 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void PLANE_CLIP_SEGMENT(
00114         const CLASS_POINT& s1,
00115         const CLASS_POINT &s2,const CLASS_PLANE &plane,CLASS_POINT &clipped)
00116 {
00117         GREAL _dis1,_dis2;
00118         _dis1 = DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(plane,s1);
00119         VEC_DIFF(clipped,s2,s1);
00120         _dis2 = VEC_DOT(clipped,plane);
00121         VEC_SCALE(clipped,-_dis1/_dis2,clipped);
00122         VEC_SUM(clipped,clipped,s1);
00123 }
00124 
00125 enum ePLANE_INTERSECTION_TYPE
00126 {
00127         G_BACK_PLANE = 0,
00128         G_COLLIDE_PLANE,
00129         G_FRONT_PLANE
00130 };
00131 
00132 enum eLINE_PLANE_INTERSECTION_TYPE
00133 {
00134         G_FRONT_PLANE_S1 = 0,
00135         G_FRONT_PLANE_S2,
00136         G_BACK_PLANE_S1,
00137         G_BACK_PLANE_S2,
00138         G_COLLIDE_PLANE_S1,
00139         G_COLLIDE_PLANE_S2
00140 };

00155 template<typename CLASS_POINT,typename CLASS_PLANE>
00156 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE eLINE_PLANE_INTERSECTION_TYPE PLANE_CLIP_SEGMENT2(
00157         const CLASS_POINT& s1,
00158         const CLASS_POINT &s2,
00159         const CLASS_PLANE &plane,CLASS_POINT &clipped)
00160 {
00161         GREAL _dis1 = DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(plane,s1);
00162         GREAL _dis2 = DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(plane,s2);
00163         if(_dis1 >-G_EPSILON && _dis2 >-G_EPSILON)
00164         {
00165             if(_dis1<_dis2) return G_FRONT_PLANE_S1;
00166             return G_FRONT_PLANE_S2;
00167         }
00168         else if(_dis1 <G_EPSILON && _dis2 <G_EPSILON)
00169         {
00170             if(_dis1>_dis2) return G_BACK_PLANE_S1;
00171             return G_BACK_PLANE_S2;
00172         }
00173 
00174         VEC_DIFF(clipped,s2,s1);
00175         _dis2 = VEC_DOT(clipped,plane);
00176         VEC_SCALE(clipped,-_dis1/_dis2,clipped);
00177         VEC_SUM(clipped,clipped,s1);
00178         if(_dis1<_dis2) return G_COLLIDE_PLANE_S1;
00179         return G_COLLIDE_PLANE_S2;
00180 }
00181 
00183 
00197 template<typename CLASS_POINT,typename CLASS_PLANE>
00198 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE eLINE_PLANE_INTERSECTION_TYPE PLANE_CLIP_SEGMENT_CLOSEST(
00199         const CLASS_POINT& s1,
00200         const CLASS_POINT &s2,
00201         const CLASS_PLANE &plane,
00202         CLASS_POINT &clipped1,CLASS_POINT &clipped2)
00203 {
00204         eLINE_PLANE_INTERSECTION_TYPE intersection_type = PLANE_CLIP_SEGMENT2(s1,s2,plane,clipped1);
00205         switch(intersection_type)
00206         {
00207         case G_FRONT_PLANE_S1:
00208                 VEC_COPY(clipped1,s1);
00209             VEC_COPY(clipped2,s2);
00210                 break;
00211         case G_FRONT_PLANE_S2:
00212                 VEC_COPY(clipped1,s2);
00213             VEC_COPY(clipped2,s1);
00214                 break;
00215         case G_BACK_PLANE_S1:
00216                 VEC_COPY(clipped1,s1);
00217             VEC_COPY(clipped2,s2);
00218                 break;
00219         case G_BACK_PLANE_S2:
00220                 VEC_COPY(clipped1,s2);
00221             VEC_COPY(clipped2,s1);
00222                 break;
00223         case G_COLLIDE_PLANE_S1:
00224                 VEC_COPY(clipped2,s1);
00225                 break;
00226         case G_COLLIDE_PLANE_S2:
00227                 VEC_COPY(clipped2,s2);
00228                 break;
00229         }
00230         return intersection_type;
00231 }

00242 template<typename T,typename CLASS_POINT,typename CLASS_PLANE>
00243 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool RAY_PLANE_COLLISION(
00244         const CLASS_PLANE & plane,
00245         const CLASS_POINT & vDir,
00246         const CLASS_POINT & vPoint,
00247         CLASS_POINT & pout,T &tparam)
00248 {
00249         GREAL _dis,_dotdir;
00250         _dotdir = VEC_DOT(plane,vDir);
00251         if(_dotdir<PLANEDIREPSILON)
00252         {
00253             return false;
00254         }
00255         _dis = DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(plane,vPoint);
00256         tparam = -_dis/_dotdir;
00257         VEC_SCALE(pout,tparam,vDir);
00258         VEC_SUM(pout,vPoint,pout);
00259         return true;
00260 }

00269 template<typename T,typename CLASS_POINT,typename CLASS_PLANE>
00270 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE GUINT LINE_PLANE_COLLISION(
00271         const CLASS_PLANE & plane,
00272         const CLASS_POINT & vDir,
00273         const CLASS_POINT & vPoint,
00274         CLASS_POINT & pout,
00275         T &tparam,
00276         T tmin, T tmax)
00277 {
00278         GREAL _dis,_dotdir;
00279         _dotdir = VEC_DOT(plane,vDir);
00280         if(btFabs(_dotdir)<PLANEDIREPSILON)
00281         {
00282                 tparam = tmax;
00283             return 0;
00284         }
00285         _dis = DISTANCE_PLANE_POINT(plane,vPoint);
00286         char returnvalue = _dis<0.0f?2:1;
00287         tparam = -_dis/_dotdir;
00288 
00289         if(tparam<tmin)
00290         {
00291                 returnvalue = 0;
00292                 tparam = tmin;
00293         }
00294         else if(tparam>tmax)
00295         {
00296                 returnvalue = 0;
00297                 tparam = tmax;
00298         }
00299 
00300         VEC_SCALE(pout,tparam,vDir);
00301         VEC_SUM(pout,vPoint,pout);
00302         return returnvalue;
00303 }

00315 template<typename CLASS_POINT,typename CLASS_PLANE>
00316 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool INTERSECT_PLANES(
00317                 const CLASS_PLANE &p1,
00318                 const CLASS_PLANE &p2,
00319                 CLASS_POINT &p,
00320                 CLASS_POINT &d)
00321 {
00322         VEC_CROSS(d,p1,p2);
00323         GREAL denom = VEC_DOT(d, d);
00324         if(GIM_IS_ZERO(denom)) return false;
00325         vec3f _n;
00326         _n[0]=p1[3]*p2[0] - p2[3]*p1[0];
00327         _n[1]=p1[3]*p2[1] - p2[3]*p1[1];
00328         _n[2]=p1[3]*p2[2] - p2[3]*p1[2];
00329         VEC_CROSS(p,_n,d);
00330         p[0]/=denom;
00331         p[1]/=denom;
00332         p[2]/=denom;
00333         return true;
00334 }

00340 template<typename CLASS_POINT>
00341 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void CLOSEST_POINT_ON_SEGMENT(
00342         CLASS_POINT & cp, const CLASS_POINT & v,
00343         const CLASS_POINT &e1,const CLASS_POINT &e2)
00344 {
00345     vec3f _n;
00346     VEC_DIFF(_n,e2,e1);
00347     VEC_DIFF(cp,v,e1);
00348         GREAL _scalar = VEC_DOT(cp, _n);
00349         _scalar/= VEC_DOT(_n, _n);
00350         if(_scalar <0.0f)
00351         {
00352             VEC_COPY(cp,e1);
00353         }
00354         else if(_scalar >1.0f)
00355         {
00356             VEC_COPY(cp,e2);
00357         }
00358         else
00359         {
00360         VEC_SCALE(cp,_scalar,_n);
00361         VEC_SUM(cp,cp,e1);
00362         }
00363 }

00377 template<typename T,typename CLASS_POINT>
00378 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool LINE_INTERSECTION_PARAMS(
00379         const CLASS_POINT & dir1,
00380         CLASS_POINT & point1,
00381         const CLASS_POINT & dir2,
00382         CLASS_POINT &  point2,
00383         T& t1,T& t2)
00384 {
00385     GREAL det;
00386         GREAL e1e1 = VEC_DOT(dir1,dir1);
00387         GREAL e1e2 = VEC_DOT(dir1,dir2);
00388         GREAL e2e2 = VEC_DOT(dir2,dir2);
00389         vec3f p1p2;
00390     VEC_DIFF(p1p2,point1,point2);
00391     GREAL p1p2e1 = VEC_DOT(p1p2,dir1);
00392         GREAL p1p2e2 = VEC_DOT(p1p2,dir2);
00393         det = e1e2*e1e2 - e1e1*e2e2;
00394         if(GIM_IS_ZERO(det)) return false;
00395         t1 = (e1e2*p1p2e2 - e2e2*p1p2e1)/det;
00396         t2 = (e1e1*p1p2e2 - e1e2*p1p2e1)/det;
00397         return true;
00398 }
00399 
00401 template<typename CLASS_POINT>
00402 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void SEGMENT_COLLISION(
00403         const CLASS_POINT & vA1,
00404         const CLASS_POINT & vA2,
00405         const CLASS_POINT & vB1,
00406         const CLASS_POINT & vB2,
00407         CLASS_POINT & vPointA,
00408         CLASS_POINT & vPointB)
00409 {
00410     CLASS_POINT _AD,_BD,n;
00411     vec4f _M;//plane
00412     VEC_DIFF(_AD,vA2,vA1);
00413     VEC_DIFF(_BD,vB2,vB1);
00414     VEC_CROSS(n,_AD,_BD);
00415     GREAL _tp = VEC_DOT(n,n);
00416     if(_tp<G_EPSILON)//ARE PARALELE
00417     {
00418         //project B over A
00419         bool invert_b_order = false;
00420         _M[0] = VEC_DOT(vB1,_AD);
00421         _M[1] = VEC_DOT(vB2,_AD);
00422         if(_M[0]>_M[1])
00423         {
00424                 invert_b_order  = true;
00425                 GIM_SWAP_NUMBERS(_M[0],_M[1]);
00426         }
00427         _M[2] = VEC_DOT(vA1,_AD);
00428         _M[3] = VEC_DOT(vA2,_AD);
00429         //mid points
00430         n[0] = (_M[0]+_M[1])*0.5f;
00431         n[1] = (_M[2]+_M[3])*0.5f;
00432 
00433         if(n[0]<n[1])
00434         {
00435                 if(_M[1]<_M[2])
00436                 {
00437                         vPointB = invert_b_order?vB1:vB2;
00438                         vPointA = vA1;
00439                 }
00440                 else if(_M[1]<_M[3])
00441                 {
00442                         vPointB = invert_b_order?vB1:vB2;
00443                         CLOSEST_POINT_ON_SEGMENT(vPointA,vPointB,vA1,vA2);
00444                 }
00445                 else
00446                 {
00447                         vPointA = vA2;
00448                         CLOSEST_POINT_ON_SEGMENT(vPointB,vPointA,vB1,vB2);
00449                 }
00450         }
00451         else
00452         {
00453                 if(_M[3]<_M[0])
00454                 {
00455                         vPointB = invert_b_order?vB2:vB1;
00456                         vPointA = vA2;
00457                 }
00458                 else if(_M[3]<_M[1])
00459                 {
00460                         vPointA = vA2;
00461                         CLOSEST_POINT_ON_SEGMENT(vPointB,vPointA,vB1,vB2);
00462                 }
00463                 else
00464                 {
00465                         vPointB = invert_b_order?vB1:vB2;
00466                         CLOSEST_POINT_ON_SEGMENT(vPointA,vPointB,vA1,vA2);
00467                 }
00468         }
00469         return;
00470     }
00471 
00472 
00473     VEC_CROSS(_M,n,_BD);
00474     _M[3] = VEC_DOT(_M,vB1);
00475 
00476     LINE_PLANE_COLLISION(_M,_AD,vA1,vPointA,_tp,btScalar(0), btScalar(1));
00477     /*Closest point on segment*/
00478     VEC_DIFF(vPointB,vPointA,vB1);
00479         _tp = VEC_DOT(vPointB, _BD);
00480         _tp/= VEC_DOT(_BD, _BD);
00481         _tp = GIM_CLAMP(_tp,0.0f,1.0f);
00482     VEC_SCALE(vPointB,_tp,_BD);
00483     VEC_SUM(vPointB,vPointB,vB1);
00484 }

00500 template<typename T>
00501 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool BOX_AXIS_INTERSECT(T pos, T dir,T bmin, T bmax, T & tfirst, T & tlast)
00502 {
00503         if(GIM_IS_ZERO(dir))
00504         {
00505         return !(pos < bmin || pos > bmax);
00506         }
00507         GREAL a0 = (bmin - pos) / dir;
00508         GREAL a1 = (bmax - pos) / dir;
00509         if(a0 > a1)   GIM_SWAP_NUMBERS(a0, a1);
00510         tfirst = GIM_MAX(a0, tfirst);
00511         tlast = GIM_MIN(a1, tlast);
00512         if (tlast < tfirst) return false;
00513         return true;
00514 }

00518 template<typename T>
00519 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void SORT_3_INDICES(
00520                 const T * values,
00521                 GUINT * order_indices)
00522 {
00523         //get minimum
00524         order_indices[0] = values[0] < values[1] ? (values[0] < values[2] ? 0 : 2) : (values[1] < values[2] ? 1 : 2);
00525 
00526         //get second and third
00527         GUINT i0 = (order_indices[0] + 1)%3;
00528         GUINT i1 = (i0 + 1)%3;
00529 
00530         if(values[i0] < values[i1])
00531         {
00532                 order_indices[1] = i0;
00533                 order_indices[2] = i1;
00534         }
00535         else
00536         {
00537                 order_indices[1] = i1;
00538                 order_indices[2] = i0;
00539         }
00540 }
